item.title: Southland Holdings Inc 10-K
item.description: Southland Holdings Inc, which is in the Heavy Construction Other Than Building Const - Contractors [1600] industry, SEC 10-K filing on March 21, 2023 had 27257 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: company - 437 instances business - 276 instances may - 256 instances financial - 203 instances shares - 181 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here. View the actual filing on the SEC website here
